verses.roman:
puruṣottame prabhu-pāśe bhagavān ācārya
parama vaiṣṇava teṅho supaṇḍita ārya

synonyms: puruṣottame—at Jagannātha Purī; prabhu-pāśe—in the association of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bhagavān ācārya—Bhagavān Ācārya; parama vaiṣṇava—pure devotee; teṅho—he; su-paṇḍita—very learned scholar; ārya—gentleman.
translation: At Jagannātha Purī, in the association of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, lived Bhagavān Ācārya, who was certainly a gentleman, a learned scholar and a great devotee.

purport.content: For a description of Bhagavān Ācārya, one may refer to the Ādi-līlā, Tenth Chapter, verse 136.
